Detailed Description

plType is the base class of all ProBT types.

Member Function Documentation

unsigned int plType::cardinality ( ) const

Get the type cardinality.

bool plType::get_random_value_from_index ( plData &  result,
unsigned int  index 
) const

For discretized types, draws a value from the interval represented by the given index.

Throws if the type is not discretized. Return false if the index is out-of-bounds, true otherwise.

bool plType::get_value_from_index ( plData &  result,
unsigned int  index 
) const

For discretized types, get as result the center of the interval represented by the given index.

Throws if the type is not discretized. Return false if the index is out-of-bounds, true otherwise.

template<typename T >
bool plType::get_value_index ( unsigned int &  result,
const T &  value 
) const

For discretized types, get the index representing the given value.

Throws if the type is not discretized. Return false if the value is invalid, true otherwise.

bool plType::is_empty ( ) const
inline

Return true if the object is default-constructed (as opposed to fully initialized).

In that case, it is invalid for the creation of plSymbols.

template<typename T >
bool plType::next_value ( T &  v) const

Returns true if v has a successor and sets v to the successor otherwise it return false.

Implemented for typenames float, double, long double, int.

plType& plType::operator= ( const plType &  other)

Assignment operator.

protectedvirtual

Implements plObject.
